name: hero (itch) (Benjamin Red)
description:
Crash through hordes and build your super powers to save the day. This chaotic battle arena bombards you with non-stop challenges. How will you react?

Unlock new abilities -- bombs, dash, supercharge -- to level the playing field. You can boost your character's base statistics, or amp up individual abilities, with upgrades and power-ups. You'll earn...

  • Stronger Impact - hit harder and launch enemies higher
  • Enhanced Range - greater reach and wider blast areas
  • Increased Speed - faster recharge times
  • Multiplied Powers - get two, three, four or five times the effects

Enjoy! Hero is the third game in a triptych along with grav and bbox. If you have questions or feedback, hit me up me on Twitter, or leave a comment below.
